description: Provisions or modifies a product based on the resource changes for the specified plan.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: IdempotencyToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier that you provide to ensure idempotency. If multiple requests differ only by the idempotency token, the same response is returned for each repeated request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: RecordDetail
nested_items.description: Information about the result of provisioning the product.

nested_items.name: RecordId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the record.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedProductName
nested_items.description: The user-friendly name of the provisioned product.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the provisioned product.
CREATED - The request was created but the operation has not started.
IN_PROGRESS - The requested operation is in progress.
IN_PROGRESS_IN_ERROR - The provisioned product is under change but the requested operation failed and some remediation is occurring. For example, a rollback.
SUCCEEDED - The requested operation has successfully completed.
FAILED - The requested operation has unsuccessfully completed. Investigate using the error messages returned.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time stamp of the creation time.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the record was last updated.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedProductType
nested_items.description: The type of provisioned product. The supported values are CFN_STACK, CFN_STACKSET, TERRAFORM_OPEN_SOURCE, TERRAFORM_CLOUD, and EXTERNAL.

nested_items.name: RecordType
nested_items.description: The record type.
PROVISION_PRODUCT.
UPDATE_PROVISIONED_PRODUCT.
TERMINATE_PROVISIONED_PRODUCT.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedProductId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the provisioned product.

nested_items.name: ProductId
nested_items.description: The product identifier.

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: PathId
nested_items.description: The path identifier.

nested_items.name: RecordErrors
nested_items.description: The errors that occurred.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the error.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the error.

nested_items.name: RecordTags
nested_items.description: One or more tags.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for this tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for this tag.

nested_items.name: LaunchRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the launch role associated with the provisioned product.
